memberdef.argsstring: (const int *lbl_true, const int *lbl_pred, const int &n_true, const int &n_pred)
memberdef.name: compute_score

briefdescription.para: Compute the available scores related to the input labels. This is the core function of the object.

parameterdescription.para: size of the array lbl_true (aka number of true labels)
size of the array lbl_pred (aka number of predicted labels)

briefdescription.para: Print the scores related to class statistics, i.e a score for each class. The output is a table in which each score is represented by a row.
Print the scores related to overall statistics, i.e a global score among classes. The output is a table in which each score is represented by a row.
Print the full list of scores, i.e the class statistics followed by the overall statistics.
Dump the statistics to file. The file will save only the class statistics in csv format.
Convert/Encode the input labels from any type to int (categorical).

parameterdescription.para: Any "simple" type in which the label are stored.

briefdescription.para: Abstract type which stores the full list of scores and allows their evaluation using parallel environment.

detaileddescription.para: Each member of the class represents a different score (class statistics and overall statistics).
